remarks: Tuple-wise right inverse in groups.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
statement:
grpvlinv.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpvlinv.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
grpvlinv.n $e |- N = ( invg ` G ) $.
grpvlinv.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
grpvrinv $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. ( B ^m I ) ) -> ( X oF .+ ( N o. X ) ) = ( I X. { .0. } ) ) $.
